moves.1. e4 c5: the Sicilian is a good opening of mine
moves.7... h6 8. Nf3 Bg7 9. Ne2 Ne7 10. c3: c3 is to go d4 and gain control of the center.
moves.10... O-O 11. Be3 Nbc6 12. Qd2 Kh7 13. h: looks like hes going to attack my king.
moves.13... d5: if someone attacks on the flanks attack in the center.
moves.14. exd5 exd5 15. Bb3 Be6: ? he could have taken on c5.
ok my king is safer then before.
moves.21... b5 22. axb5 axb5 23. Kh2: i dont know why he did this?
moves.23... Qd7 24. Qc2 Kg8 25. b3 Qf5: forced to trade, if not i gain control of the board.
moves.26. Qxf5 Nxf5 27. g4 Nfe7 28. bxc4 bxc4: here i offered a draw he said no.
moves.29. Bd6 Rfd8 30. Bxe7 Nxe7: my d5 pawn is weak my bishop is on the wrong color to guard it.
moves.31. Nf4 Kf8 32. Rfb1 Rxa1 33. Rxa1 Ke8 3: i must guard my d5 pawn!
moves.34... Rd6 35. Ne1: his plan is to go nc2 then ne3 and win the d5 pawn.
i'm glad to trade my bad Bishop for his knight.
now he has a weak e5 pawn.
moves.44... Ke7 45. e6 d4: !! with the rook behind the c4 pawn i can push.
moves.46. cxd4 Nxd4 47. exf7+ Kxf7: if i can i will go nf3+winning!
moves.48. Rd1 Ne6 49. Rd5: i'm glad to exchange but first i make the winning move do you see it?
moves.49... c3: !!!!!!!! this wins! the rook has to trade if not i win his knight!!
moves.50. Rxc5 Nxc5 51. Ne2 c2: if he does not nc1 i will go nd3 winning.
king d4 is better than kc4 why ke3!
moves.55... Kc3 56. Ke3 Kb2 57. Ne2 Na4: he is just about to get in a zugzwang!
moves.58. Kd2 Nc3: !!!!!! wins he is in a zugzwang
moves.59. Nc1 Ne4+: resigns!! because i win his knight and promote my pawn!

gameName: how to win a losing game.
